result.title: D2.4 Position Paper and Conference report
result.description:
Position Paper and Conference report - discuss and agree Position paper on future investments and coordinated R&I instruments to strengthen synergy between SFNS industry, policy and society.
The Conference will bring together the representatives of different sectors of the modern economy and jointly build a case and come to an agreement for future investments and coordination of policies both on national and EU level aimed at maximizing the impact of R&I on SFNS industry, policy and society in response to the societal needs and expectations, climate change and globalization, and leveraging private investments and increasing synergies with public funding.

result.title: IEC 62108 Certification
result.description: This deliverable will consist in obtaining the IEC 62108 for the 1000X BSQ modules produced at the pilot assembly line set in WP2 by a European accredited laboratory. This will be the result of a set of on-site and in-lab tests that ensure that the modules have a proper performance under real operation conditions.
